title: Flexible electrode of Fe-doped NiSe2@porous graphene as binder-free anode for lithium-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,837-842
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01214J, Paper
Caiyun Guo, Bo Zhang, Mengru Xiao, Mingming Hao, Liting Zhao, Xiaoting Zhang, Hongyan Zhang, Rui Wang
Fe-doped NiSe2@porous graphene is prepared via filtration, annealing, and selenylation. The interfacial interaction between graphene and NiSe2 is enhanced by Fe doping and facilitates the transfer of lithium ions and electrons.
